short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Estimate data usage based on YouTube video quality settings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We understand how frustrating it can be when you run out of data on your plan. Which is why we have build DataMeter to help you effectively manage and keep track of your data.

Data Meter gives users instant estimates of YouTube data usage displayed on video thumbnails, so you know how much data a video will consume before you watch it. 

No more wasting data on videos you don't care about!
